name: testing-coverage-pack
description: Testing strategy and coverage pack. Defines the enterprise test pyramid, test templates per layer, CI/CD quality gates, critical user journey catalog, and load test scenarios for SLO validation.
author: Francisco J Bernades <@exchanet>
provides: Enterprise test pyramid allocation (Unit 70%, Integration 20%, E2E 7%, Chaos 3%)
Unit test templates (happy path, error, edge case, security, performance)
Integration test scenarios per integration point type
